xuiButton
directive in module xui

Description

Button built over bootstrap button.

Usage

as element:
<xui-button
       [size="{string}"]
       [name="{string}"]
       [tool-tip="{string}"]
       [display-style="{string}"]
       [icon="{string}"]
       [icon-right="{boolean}"]
       [icon-color="{string}"]
       [is-busy="{boolean}"]
       [is-disabled="{boolean}"]
       [is-empty="{boolean}"]
       [xui-repeat="{boolean}"]
       [tooltip-append-to-body="{boolean}"]>
</xui-button>

Parameters

ParamTypeDetails
size
(optional)
string

Values can be "large", "small", or "xsmall".

name
(optional)
string

Name of the element.

tool-tip
(optional)
string

Tooltip for the button.

display-style
(optional)
string

Values can be "primary" | "tertiary" | "link".

icon
(optional)
string

The icon that should be rendered on the button.

icon-right
(optional)
boolean

Indicates if the icon on the button is right aligned.

icon-color
(optional)
string

The color to be applied to the icon on the button. (default value for "primary": "white", "secondary" | "tertiary" | "link": "primary-blue")

is-busy
(optional)
boolean

Indicates if busy indicator should display.

is-disabled
(optional)
boolean

Indicates if the button should appear as disabled.

is-empty
(optional)
boolean

Indicates if the button has any text contents (this is generally set dynamically but when nested in other directives like menu it can be useful).

xui-repeat
(optional)
boolean

Indicates if the button should auto-repeat its ng-click behavior while the button is pressed down for an extended period of time.

tooltip-append-to-body
(optional)
boolean

Appends the tooltip to '$body' instead of the parent element.

Example
